description: John and Sarah meet at their usual cafe. John appears nervous as he discusses their upcoming project deadline, while Sarah reassures him with a confident smile. The afternoon sun streams through the windows, creating a warm atmosphere despite John's anxiety. Several other patrons work on laptops in the background, creating a quiet buzz of activity.
dialogue: John: I don't know if we're going to make this deadline. The client wants so many changes.
Sarah: We've been in tighter spots before. Remember the Morrison project?
John: That was different. We had more resources then.
Sarah: True, but we're smarter now. We can do this.
camera_setup: Stationary, medium shot with depth of field focus on characters, background slightly blurred
lighting_conditions: Natural daylight through windows, warm tones
sound_conditions: Ambient cafe noise, low background music, occasional cups clinking
